extendedInfo.description: Press the Big Fart Button and play over 30 different random farting sounds.Make sure you turn up your Media Volume to hear the farts in all their glory.Be sure to rate us 5 stars for awesome flatulence fun!Like the Big Fart Button? Upgrade to the Big Fart Button Pro! (No ads and no permissions are needed to run the Pro version of Big Fart Button)https://market.android.com/details?id=com.derekentringer.bigfartbuttonpro(Smells not included)Like Big Fart Button on Facebook: http://facebook.com/BigFartButtonFollow Big Fart Button on Twitter: http://twitter.com/BigFartButton

reviews.title: Warning!  Malware!
reviews.comment: App does not need these excessive permissions, period.  Warning,  everyone should be checking when too many permissions are requested!!! Pay attention or get violated!  A fart button should need ZERO permissions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App Permissions
reviews.comment: Wanted to note here, because of a recent comment, that the permissions used in the Big Fart Button are only required to show ads within the App. They are not excessive, but are only required to display the ads, nothing else. If you are interested in supporting further development, no ads are displayed in the Big Fart Button Pro version available for $0.99. Thx!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: dis z really awsome aap.. one must download it ..:-P ;-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Widget please?
reviews.comment: For the most part, this app is pretty great and hilarious, does exactly what it says it does. However I would really like to have a widget so you can quickly get a fart button press off without having to open up the app. That would be great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very neat
